title: Rotating game mode queue now live!

replies.body: doom bots pls

agreed plz riot give us doom bots, that's what i've been looking forward to since the rotating game modes came out{{item:3070}}
yes doom bots plz riot

Ok, a little feedback and comparison between the old dominion game mode and this totally different one.

I feel there is a problem with the new tower layout. With the bot 2 towers locked out, the arena has been transformed from a circle to more of a single curved lane, with the aim being to control at least 2 out of the 3 remaining towers in the lane.

The two towers outside the respective team's spawns is ridiculously easy to hold both by respawners or by moving the short distance between towers. This pretty much leaves the top tower as the deciding factor. The team that can rush and capture it at the start of the game just has to sit the team on that tower (with maybe 1 hanging 1/2 way between top and mid tower to defend mid). Now the other team has to siege the tower while their points counts down, which is very difficult if the other team has blindpicked a better team fighting comp and has a bit of waveclear.

With the old dominion, if the enemy team is better at teamfighting and is holding top, you could scatter and cap the bottom 2 towers, forcing them to split up to respond to you. Now, if they enemy has a better team fighting comp, it likely means that they will take top first, and hold it until they have an unbeatable lead, if not to the end of the game.

Far out it's about freaking time OCE got the dominion queue.
Only took you guys 4 years, 9 months, 24 days. 
Wish it went longer than 3 days. :(
About freaking time indeed. Also, regarding the length of Rotating Game Modes,  expanding their up time is on the table once we see the long term popularity and health of the queue. Here's hoping!

Flailing the broken corpse of Dominion around like a piece of rubbish.

When I saw this game mode, I was worried that it's just going to be the old dominion with a fake moustache and glasses on the middle of the map. After reading the game update, I'm happy that they updated it, but disappointed that there's no fake moustache and glasses on the middle of the map.
DOOM BOTS PLS
Riot wtf i was 24/6/14 had 1414 of captured towers or whatever and insteaed or getting an S i got an A+ wtf i'm salty that's absolute bullshit
Please keep rotating game mode but from thursday maybe?
It was disabled because it's trash and no one played it... 3 months ago... and here we are with dominion when we could have had a fun game mode this weekend.

Are you even a part of the OCE community, or did you just miss out the part where OCE hadn't had the map in the queues ever. If you wanted to play it you needed to go into custom games which instantly turned most people off.

People wanted to play it, the whole entire OCE community wanted to play it to at least to say goodbye to the old mode. But were ignored by whoever at Riot is calling the shots. The problem with most people is that we were told what we wanted, which is the opposite of what we wanted.
dominion was out before custom games and it got deleted because it was horrible and no-one played it

It was out on NA and almost every other region. Maybe your claims about it being horrible/unplayed would have ground if we actually had it but we didn't.

And with every patch, there were always people still asking for it. People wanted it, people wanted to play it. They were just told that they could not because we're not as big as the rest of the world. It wasn't even trialed here, we were just told no.

Well I can't say I played it on OCE, but I can say I played it, maybe before we had OCE servers. You do know league isn't region locked right? you could have gone onto US servers to play it if it wasn't enabled here?

This weekend game mode is ment to be for fun quirky modes they don't want on a permanent queue. Not this horrid game mode they had to disable.

That was the most fun I've had in ages, thanks for bringing Dominion back, even if it was a short time! ;)

so ive played 6 games and won all 6 by like 350+ (not saying im good half of them have more deaths than kills, so far as i can tell its whoever gets the top point first wins, everyone stuffs around on the map aslong as u have someone top guarding the point your team has enough time to come and react leading to (i hate when ppl say it) ez wins.... ALSO, DOOMBOTS WAS FUN YOU HAVE TO ADMIT IT

I've played 20 games yesterday. Lost 16. 95% games were with afk (or disconnected) team members or people who didn't understand the importance of the top point in this mode. Most people tried to control middle and bottom (???). Nothing changed after explanation - most people thinking that this game mode is about PVP only. Not about control and tactics. Sigh.

You know how there is 5 people on your team right. that gives u 4 chances to find a Feeder or an AFKer, Did you know that the enemy team also has 5 people :O and they have 5 chances to find a Feeder or an AFKer, if you could do simple math you would realize that there is a higher chance of them getting an "AFKer or a Feeder"..... Just sayin..

Also makes 4v5s have a chance at being winnable.
